/usr/bin/c++  -g   CMakeFiles/kinect_test.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/kinect_test.dir/serialport.cpp.o CMakeFiles/kinect_test.dir/BoardControl.cpp.o  -o kinect_test /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_thread.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_system.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_filesystem.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_regex.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_chrono.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_date_time.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_atomic.so -lpthread -lfreenect -lopencv_objdetect -lopencv_features2d -lopencv_imgproc -lopencv_highgui -lopencv_core -lopencv_contrib
